From SDS 322 many years ago...

```{r}
# Section 9.7 - power for F-test comparing two variances
x=seq(0,10,length=1000)
fnull=df(x,8,11)
plot(x,fnull,type="l")
falt=df(x/4,8,11)/4
lines(x,falt,lty=2)
c1=qf(.025,8,11)
c2=qf(.975,8,11)
lines(c(c1,c1),c(0,df(c1,8,11)),lty=3)
lines(c(c2,c2),c(0,df(c2/4,8,11)/4),lty=3)

c1=qf(.025,8,11)  # 0.24
c2=qf(.975,8,11)  # 3.66
power=1-pf(c2/4,8,11)+pf(c1/4,8,11)
power

pvalue=2*(1-pf(1.63,8,11))
pvalue
```
